com.mygdx.game.controller.entities

Class BoostController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.controller.entities.EntityController
      • com.mygdx.game.controller.entities.BoostController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoostStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlyBoostController, NaturalBoostController, NoCollisionsBoostController

    public abstract class BoostController
extends EntityController
implements BoostStrategy
    A class to represent the boost controllers
    See Also:
    EntityController, BoostStrategy
